attributes.action: Persuade David Cameron to re-consider his resignation!
attributes.additional_details: Seriously the other 2 current options are so poor so I'd rather have Dave sorting it out..After all he caused the problem in the first place and shouldn't be allowed to walk away from it!!
attributes.background:
He's a good PM, a decent bloke and a far better proposition then Theresa May and the other one!!

He knows the EU and will respect BREXIT.. Because he does love the country!

He secretly likes living at No10 & doesn't really want to move! Neither does Sam Cam!

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
